doc.title: 3 minuter evighet
doc.plot: A young woman is waiting for the train in an empty underground station. Suddenly a man shows up, he is walking far too close to the tracks, like he is ready to jump. It's only three minutes until the train will come. Will she be able to rescue him, and does he even need rescuing?
